SEARCH
Package org.zssn.escaperoom

Class Item

java.lang.Object
org.zssn.escaperoom.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClueItem, HealingItem, HiderItem, HidingItem, ItemContainer, Key, Note
public class Item extends Object
Class Item - Represents an item in the game. It has a name, an image, a weight, a current room, and a pickable state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String name, String image, int weight, int currentRoom, boolean pickable)
      Constructor for the Item
      Parameters:
      name - name of the item
      image - image of the item given as the name of the file in the src/main/resources folder
      weight - weight of the item
      currentRoom - current room of the item
      pickable - pickable state of the item
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the weight is less than 0 or the room is not between 0 and 9

      public void setRoom(int room)
      Set the current room (if 0, then it is picked by the player)
      Parameters:
      room - room of the object given as an integer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the room is not between 0 and 9
